short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A tool for bookmarking progresses in Walkthrough on TrueAchievements.com

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: TrueAchievements.com doesn't currently offer bookmarking within walkthrough pages.  This tool fills that gap by letting you bookmark specific paragraphs within any walkthrough page on the site.
